title: Undirected simple graphs
content: In this section, "simple graph" will always stand for "undirected simple graph (without loops)" and "simple pseudograph" for "undirected simple pseudograph (which could have loops)".

blocks.name: cuspgr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with undirected simple pseudographs (which could have loops).
blocks.origin: const class cuspgr { USPGraph }

diff.cuspgr.c

cusgr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with undirected simple graphs (without loops).
blocks.origin: const class cusgr { USGraph }

blocks.name: diff.cusgr.s
diff.cusgr.c
diff.cusgr.w
df-uspgr
blocks.content: Define the class of all undirected simple pseudographs (which could have loops). An undirected simple pseudograph is a special undirected pseudograph (see ~ uspgrupgr ) or a special undirected simple hypergraph (see ~ uspgrushgr ), consisting of a set ` v ` (of "vertices") and an injective (one-to-one) function ` e ` (representing (indexed) "edges") into subsets of ` v ` of cardinality one or two, representing the two vertices incident to the edge, or the one vertex if the edge is a loop. In contrast to a pseudograph, there is at most one edge between two vertices resp. at most one loop for a vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 13-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-uspgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cuspgr, cab(s0, wsbc(s1, cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(ciedg, cv(s0)), wf1(cv(s2), cdm(cv(s2)), crab(s3, cdif(cpw(cv(s1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s3)), cle, nat2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-usgr
blocks.content: Define the class of all undirected simple graphs (without loops). An undirected simple graph is a special undirected simple pseudograph (see ~ usgruspgr ), consisting of a set ` v ` (of "vertices") and an injective (one-to-one) function ` e ` (representing (indexed) "edges") into subsets of ` v ` of cardinality two, representing the two vertices incident to the edge. In contrast to an undirected simple pseudograph, an undirected simple graph has no loops (edges connecting a vertex with itself). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 13-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-usgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cusgr, cab(s0, wsbc(s1, cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(ciedg, cv(s0)), wf1(cv(s2), cdm(cv(s2)), crab(s3, cdif(cpw(cv(s1)), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s3)), nat2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: isuspgr
blocks.content: The property of being a simple pseudograph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 13-Oct-2020.)

thm isuspgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cuspgr), wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cuspgr), wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))), wcel(c0, cab(hs2, wsbc(hs1, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs2)), wsbc(hs0, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), wf1(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))))))
  eleq2i(c0, cuspgr, cab(hs2, wsbc(hs1, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs2)), wsbc(hs0, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), wf1(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)))))))
  df-uspgr(hs2, hs1, hs0, s0)
  elab2g(hs3, c0, c1, cab(hs2, wsbc(hs1, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs2)), wsbc(hs0, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), wf1(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)))))), wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))), wf1(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  f1eq123d(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), c2, cfv(ciedg, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  syl6eq(cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), cdm(c2), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  dmeqd(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cfv(ciedg, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, ciedg)
  dmeqi(cfv(ciedg, c0), c2)
  eqcomi(cfv(ciedg, c0), c2)
  rabeqdv(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))
  difeq1d(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls), cpw(c3), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  pweqd(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)), c3, wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)), c3, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cvtx)
  cbvabv(hs2, hs3, wsbc(hs1, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs2)), wsbc(hs0, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), wf1(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))), wf1(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  sbcied2(hs1, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs2)), universe, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wsbc(hs0, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), wf1(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)))), wf1(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  fvexd(cvtx, cv(hs2), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cvtx)
  sbcied2(hs0, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), universe, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))), wf1(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))), wf1(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  fvexd(ciedg, cv(hs2), wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), wceq(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), ciedg)
  f1eq123d(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)), wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)))))
  dmeqd(cv(hs0), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)))))
  simpr(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))))
  rabeqdv(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)))), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))
  difeq1d(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls), cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), wa(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)))))
  ad2antlr(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), wceq(cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))))
  pweq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.w(wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, cv(hs3))
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cpw(c3), csn(emptycls))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.w(wf1(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  diff.hs3.w(wsbc(hs1, cfv(cvtx, cv(hs2)), wsbc(hs0, cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)), wf1(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wf1(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wf1(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3)), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(hs3))), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs3))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cpw(cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isuspgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ USPGraph ↔(c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 })))
  ⊣ c3 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ USPGraph ↔(c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))), d(s0, c0))
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ USPGraph, (c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }), c0 ∈ { hs2 |[(Vtx ` hs2)/ hs1][(iEdg ` hs2)/ hs0](hs0 : dom(hs0)↣ { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 })})
  eleq2i(c0, cuspgr, { hs2 |[(Vtx ` hs2)/ hs1][(iEdg ` hs2)/ hs0](hs0 : dom(hs0)↣ { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 })})
  df-uspgr(hs2, hs1, hs0, s0)
  elab2g(hs3, c0, c1, { hs2 |[(Vtx ` hs2)/ hs1][(iEdg ` hs2)/ hs0](hs0 : dom(hs0)↣ { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 })}, (c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }), ((iEdg ` hs3): dom((iEdg ` hs3))↣ { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  f1eq123d((iEdg ` hs3), dom((iEdg ` hs3)), { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }, c2, dom(c2), { s0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }, hs3 = c0)
  syl6eqr((iEdg ` hs3), c2, (iEdg ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  syl6eq(dom((iEdg ` hs3)), dom(c2), dom((iEdg ` c0)), hs3 = c0)
  dmeqd((iEdg ` hs3), (iEdg ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, ciedg)
  dmeqi((iEdg ` c0), c2)
  eqcomi((iEdg ` c0), c2)
  rabeqdv(s0, (P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ }), (P(c3)\ { ∅ }), hs3 = c0, (# ` s0)[≤]2)
  difeq1d(P((Vtx ` hs3)), { ∅ }, P(c3), hs3 = c0)
  pweqd((Vtx ` hs3), c3, hs3 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Vtx ` hs3), c3, (Vtx ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cvtx)
  cbvabv(hs2, hs3, [(Vtx ` hs2)/ hs1][(iEdg ` hs2)/ hs0](hs0 : dom(hs0)↣ { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }), ((iEdg ` hs3): dom((iEdg ` hs3))↣ { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  sbcied2(hs1, (Vtx ` hs2), universe, (Vtx ` hs3), hs2 = hs3, [(iEdg ` hs2)/ hs0](hs0 : dom(hs0)↣ { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }), ((iEdg ` hs3): dom((iEdg ` hs3))↣ { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  fvexd(cvtx, hs2, hs2 = hs3)
  fveq2(hs2, hs3, cvtx)
  sbcied2(hs0, (iEdg ` hs2), universe, (iEdg ` hs3), (hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3)), (hs0 : dom(hs0)↣ { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }), ((iEdg ` hs3): dom((iEdg ` hs3))↣ { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  fvexd(ciedg, hs2, (hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3)))
  adantr(hs2 = hs3, hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3), (iEdg ` hs2)=(iEdg ` hs3))
  fveq2(hs2, hs3, ciedg)
  f1eq123d(hs0, dom(hs0), { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }, (iEdg ` hs3), dom((iEdg ` hs3)), { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }, ((hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3))∧ hs0 =(iEdg ` hs3)))
  dmeqd(hs0, (iEdg ` hs3), ((hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3))∧ hs0 =(iEdg ` hs3)))
  simpr((hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3)), hs0 =(iEdg ` hs3))
  rabeqdv(s0, (P(hs1)\ { ∅ }), (P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ }), ((hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3))∧ hs0 =(iEdg ` hs3)), (# ` s0)[≤]2)
  difeq1d(P(hs1), { ∅ }, P((Vtx ` hs3)), ((hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3))∧ hs0 =(iEdg ` hs3)))
  ad2antlr(hs2 = hs3, hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3), hs0 =(iEdg ` hs3), P(hs1)= P((Vtx ` hs3)))
  pweq(hs1, (Vtx ` hs3))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.w((c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈(P(c3)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, P((Vtx ` hs3)), { ∅ })
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (Vtx ` hs3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, hs3)
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, P(c3), { ∅ })
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.w(((iEdg ` hs3): dom((iEdg ` hs3))↣ { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  diff.hs3.w([(Vtx ` hs2)/ hs1][(iEdg ` hs2)/ hs0](hs0 : dom(hs0)↣ { s0 ∈(P(hs1)\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  diff.hs1.c((Vtx ` hs2))
  diff.hs1.w(hs2 = hs3)
  diff.hs1.w(((iEdg ` hs3): dom((iEdg ` hs3))↣ { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  diff.hs0.c((iEdg ` hs2))
  diff.hs0.w((hs2 = hs3 ∧ hs1 =(Vtx ` hs3)))
  diff.hs0.w(((iEdg ` hs3): dom((iEdg ` hs3))↣ { s0 ∈(P((Vtx ` hs3))\ { ∅ })|(# ` s0)[≤]2 }))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, P(hs1), { ∅ })
  diff.cpw.s(s0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isusgr
blocks.content: The property of being a simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 13-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isusgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cusgr), wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cusgr), wf1(c2, cdm(c2), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c3), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))), diffsc(s0, c0))

blocks.name: ausgrusgrb
blocks.content: The equivalence of the definitions of a simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 14-Oct-2020.)

thm ausgrusgrb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  isausgr(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  ax-mp(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))), wf1o(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2))
  f1oi(c2)

  dff1o5(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2)
  adantr(wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wceq(crn(cres(cid, c2)), c2), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))))
  a1d(wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))))

  sylib(wa(wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2), wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  f1ss(cres(cid, c2), c2, c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))
  ax-mp(wb(wf1(cres(cid, c2), c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wceq(c2, cdm(cres(cid, c2))))

  syl11(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wf(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  simplbiim(wf(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wfn(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2))), wss(crn(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  df-f(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))
  a1d(wss(crn(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  biimpi(wss(crn(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wss(c2, crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  sseq1i(crn(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)), c2)
  rnresi(c2)
  f1f(cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))
  f1eq123d(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)), cres(cid, c2), cdm(cres(cid, c2)), crab(s2, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  dmeqd(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), cres(cid, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), cres(cid, c2)), wcel(cres(cid, c2), universe))
  opiedgfv(c0, c1, cres(cid, c2), universe)
  rabeqdv(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), cpw(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))
  pweqd(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), c0), wcel(cres(cid, c2), universe))
  resiexg(c2, c3)
  opvtxfv(c0, c1, cres(cid, c2), universe)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wf1(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wcel(cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)), cusgr)))
  bicomi(wf1(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wcel(cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)), cusgr))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)), cusgr), wf1(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wcel(cop(c0, cres(cid, c2)), universe))
  opex(c0, cres(cid, c2))

blocks.name: usgrausgri
blocks.content: A simple graph represented by an alternatively defined simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 15-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrausgri(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1, cfv(cedg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wss(cv(s1), crab(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1, cfv(cedg, c0)), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  usgredgss(s2, c0)
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1, cfv(cedg, c0)), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), universe))
  fvex(cvtx, c0)
  fvex(cedg, c0)
  isausgr(s2, s0, s1, cfv(cvtx, c0), universe, cfv(cedg, c0), universe, c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cedg, c0)
  diff.cedg.s(s2)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cedg, c0)
  diff.cedg.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cedg, c0)
  diff.cedg.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgrausgri(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph →(Vtx ` c0)[c1](Edg ` c0))
  ⊣ c1 = { < s0, s1 > | s1 ⊆ { s2 ∈ P(s0)|(# ` s2)= 2 } }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(c0 ∈ USGraph, (Vtx ` c0)[c1](Edg ` c0), (Edg ` c0)⊆ { s2 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))|(# ` s2)= 2 })
  usgredgss(s2, c0)
  mp2an(((Vtx ` c0)[c1](Edg ` c0)↔(Edg ` c0)⊆ { s2 ∈ P((Vtx ` c0))|(# ` s2)= 2 }), (Vtx ` c0)∈ 𝕌, (Edg ` c0)∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(cvtx, c0)
  fvex(cedg, c0)
  isausgr(s2, s0, s1, (Vtx ` c0), universe, (Edg ` c0), universe, c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cedg, c0)
  diff.cedg.s(s2)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cedg, c0)
  diff.cedg.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cedg, c0)
  diff.cedg.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ausgrumgri
blocks.content: If an alternatively defined simple graph has the vertices and edges of an arbitrary graph, the arbitrary graph is an undirected multigraph. (Contributed by AV, 18-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 25-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ausgrumgri(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2, cfv(cedg, c0)), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wcel(c0, cumgr))
  -| wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, wss(cv(s1), crab(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2, cfv(cedg, c0)), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wcel(c0, cumgr), wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  3imp(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2, cfv(cedg, c0)), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2, cfv(cedg, c0)), wi(wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2, cfv(cedg, c0)), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wcel(cfv(cvtx, c0), universe), wcel(cfv(cedg, c0), universe))
  fvex(cvtx, c0)
  fvex(cedg, c0)
  isausgr(s2, s0, s1, cfv(cvtx, c0), universe, cfv(cedg, c0), universe, c2)
  sylbid(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wi(wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)))), wss(crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  sseq1d(cfv(cedg, c0), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2)), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cedg, c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0))))
  edgval(c0)
  3exp(wcel(c0, c1), wss(crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wfn(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wss(crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), crab(s2, cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), nat2))), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wfn(cfv(ciedg, c0), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))))

blocks.name: uspgrun
blocks.content: The union ` U ` of two simple pseudographs ` G ` and ` H ` with the same vertex set ` V ` is a pseudograph with the vertex ` V ` and the union ` ( E u. F ) ` of the (indexed) edges. (Contributed by AV, 16-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uspgrun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cupgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cuspgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cuspgr))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ciedg, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c2), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c3), cdm(c4)), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cun(c3, c4)))
} = {
  upgrun(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cupgr), wcel(c1, cuspgr))
  uspgrupgr(c1)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cupgr), wcel(c2, cuspgr))
  uspgrupgr(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uspgrun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ USPGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ USPGraph)
  ⊣ c3 =(iEdg ` c1)
  ⊣ c4 =(iEdg ` c2)
  ⊣ c5 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c2)= c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(dom(c3)⋂ dom(c4))= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c0)= c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(iEdg ` c0)=(c3 ⋃ c4))
} = {
  upgrun(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ∈ UPGraph, c1 ∈ USPGraph)
  uspgrupgr(c1)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ UPGraph, c2 ∈ USPGraph)
  uspgrupgr(c2)
}

blocks.name: uspgrunop
blocks.content: The union of two simple pseudographs (with the same vertex set): If ` <. V , E >. ` and ` <. V , F >. ` are simple pseudographs, then ` <. V , E u. F >. ` is a pseudograph (the vertex set stays the same, but the edges from both graphs are kept, maybe resulting incident two edges between two vertices). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 16-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 24-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm uspgrunop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cupgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cuspgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cuspgr))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cvtx, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), emptycls))
} = {
  upgrunop(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cupgr), wcel(c3, cuspgr))
  uspgrupgr(c3)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cupgr), wcel(c4, cuspgr))
  uspgrupgr(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uspgrunop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → < c0,(c1 ⋃ c2)> ∈ UPGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ USPGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ USPGraph)
  ⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(iEdg ` c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(Vtx ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c4)= c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(dom(c1)⋂ dom(c2))= ∅)
} = {
  upgrunop(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ UPGraph, c3 ∈ USPGraph)
  uspgrupgr(c3)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ UPGraph, c4 ∈ USPGraph)
  uspgrupgr(c4)
}

blocks.name: usgrun
blocks.content: The union ` U ` of two simple graphs ` G ` and ` H ` with the same vertex set ` V ` is a multigraph (not necessarily a simple graph!) with the vertex ` V ` and the union ` ( E u. F ) ` of the (indexed) edges. (Contributed by AV, 29-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cumgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cusgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cusgr))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ciedg, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c2), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c3), cdm(c4)), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cun(c3, c4)))
} = {
  umgrun(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c1, cusgr))
  usgrumgr(c1)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cumgr), wcel(c2, cusgr))
  usgrumgr(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgrun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ USGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ USGraph)
  ⊣ c3 =(iEdg ` c1)
  ⊣ c4 =(iEdg ` c2)
  ⊣ c5 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c2)= c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(dom(c3)⋂ dom(c4))= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c0)= c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(iEdg ` c0)=(c3 ⋃ c4))
} = {
  umgrun(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ∈ UMGraph, c1 ∈ USGraph)
  usgrumgr(c1)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ UMGraph, c2 ∈ USGraph)
  usgrumgr(c2)
}

blocks.name: usgrunop
blocks.content: The union of two simple graphs (with the same vertex set): If ` <. V , E >. ` and ` <. V , F >. ` are simple graphs, then ` <. V , E u. F >. ` is a multigraph (not necessarily a simple graph!) - the vertex set stays the same, but the edges from both graphs are kept, possibly resulting in two edges between two vertices. (Contributed by AV, 29-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrunop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cumgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cusgr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cusgr))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cvtx, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c1), cdm(c2)), emptycls))
} = {
  umgrunop(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cumgr), wcel(c3, cusgr))
  usgrumgr(c3)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cumgr), wcel(c4, cusgr))
  usgrumgr(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgrunop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → < c0,(c1 ⋃ c2)> ∈ UMGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ USGraph)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ USGraph)
  ⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(iEdg ` c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(Vtx ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c4)= c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(dom(c1)⋂ dom(c2))= ∅)
} = {
  umgrunop(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ UMGraph, c3 ∈ USGraph)
  usgrumgr(c3)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ UMGraph, c4 ∈ USGraph)
  usgrumgr(c4)
}

blocks.name: usgredg2
blocks.content: The value of the "edge function" of a simple graph is a set containing two elements (the vertices the corresponding edge is connecting). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 16-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: usgredgppr
blocks.content: An edge of a simple graph is a proper pair, i.e. a set containing two different elements (the endvertices of the edge). Analogue of ~ usgredg2 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Aug-2017.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: usgrpredgv
blocks.content: An edge of a simple graph always connects two vertices. Analogue of ~ usgredgprv . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: edgssv2

blocks.name: usgredg
blocks.content: For each edge in a simple graph, there are two distinct vertices which are connected by this edge. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 17-Oct-2020.) (Shortened by AV, 25-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: usgrnloopv

  com23(wcel(c4, cdm(c3)), wa(wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cpr(c1, c5)), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cusgr), wne(c1, c5))
  expcom(wcel(c4, cdm(c3)), wcel(c0, cusgr), wi(wa(wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cpr(c1, c5)), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c5)))
  syl5com(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c4, cdm(c3))), wa(wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cpr(c1, c5)), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c5), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c3, c4)), nat2))
  usgredg2(c0, c4, c3)
  adantr(wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cpr(c1, c5)), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c3, c4)), nat2), wne(c1, c5)))
  syl6bi(wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cpr(c1, c5)), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c3, c4)), nat2), wne(c1, c5), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(c1, c5)), nat2))
  eqeq1d(cfv(chash, cfv(c3, c4)), nat2, cfv(chash, cpr(c1, c5)), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cpr(c1, c5)))
  fveq2(cfv(c3, c4), cpr(c1, c5), chash)
  simp3d(wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(c1, c5)), nat2), wne(c1, c5), wcel(c1, cpr(c1, c5)), wcel(c5, cpr(c1, c5)))
  hashprdifel(cpr(c1, c5), c1, c5)
  eqid(cpr(c1, c5))
}

thm usgrnloopvALT(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } → c1 ≠ c5))
  ⊣ c3 =(iEdg ` c0)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ USGraph, c1 ∈ c2, ((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } → c1 ≠ c5))
  com13(c0 ∈ USGraph, c1 ∈ c2, (c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 }, c1 ≠ c5)
  ex((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 }, c1 ∈ c2, (c0 ∈ USGraph → c1 ≠ c5))
  mpcom(((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c0 ∈ USGraph → c1 ≠ c5), (c4 ∈ dom(c3)∧ Fun((c3 |` { c4 }))))
  syl(((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c4 ∈ dom(c3)∧ Fun((c3 |` { c4 }))), (c3 ` c4)≠ ∅)
  mpbird(((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c3 ` c4)≠ ∅, { c1, c5 } ≠ ∅)
  adantl((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 }, c1 ∈ c2, { c1, c5 } ≠ ∅)
  prnzg(c1, c2, c5)
  adantr((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 }, c1 ∈ c2, ((c3 ` c4)≠ ∅ ↔ { c1, c5 } ≠ ∅))
  neeq1((c3 ` c4), { c1, c5 }, emptycls)
  fvfundmfvn0(c3, c4)
  adantr(c4 ∈ dom(c3), Fun((c3 |` { c4 })), (((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0 ∈ USGraph → c1 ≠ c5)))
  com23(c4 ∈ dom(c3), ((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ USGraph, c1 ≠ c5)
  expcom(c4 ∈ dom(c3), c0 ∈ USGraph, (((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1 ≠ c5))
  syl5com((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c4 ∈ dom(c3)), ((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 } ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1 ≠ c5, (# `(c3 ` c4))= 2)
  usgredg2(c0, c4, c3)
  adantr((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 }, c1 ∈ c2, ((# `(c3 ` c4))= 2 → c1 ≠ c5))
  syl6bi((c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 }, (# `(c3 ` c4))= 2, c1 ≠ c5, (# ` { c1, c5 })= 2)
  eqeq1d((# `(c3 ` c4)), nat2, (# ` { c1, c5 }), (c3 ` c4)= { c1, c5 })
  fveq2((c3 ` c4), { c1, c5 }, chash)
  simp3d((# ` { c1, c5 })= 2, c1 ≠ c5, c1 ∈ { c1, c5 }, c5 ∈ { c1, c5 })
  hashprdifel({ c1, c5 }, c1, c5)
  eqid({ c1, c5 })
}

blocks.name: usgrnloop
blocks.content: In a simple graph, there is no loop, i.e. no edge connecting a vertex with itself. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Aug-2017.) (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: usgrnloopALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ usgrnloop , not using ~ umgrnloop . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Aug-2017.) (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Oct-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrnloopALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wi(wrex(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3))), wne(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  rexlimdva(s0, cdm(c1), wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wne(c2, c3))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wne(c2, c3))
  mpcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3))), wne(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))))
  usgredgprv(c0, cv(s0), c1, c2, c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3))), wne(c2, c3)))
  com12(wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3))), wne(c2, c3))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wi(wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wne(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wi(wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wne(c2, c3))))
  com23(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wne(c2, c3))
  ex(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0)), wi(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wne(c2, c3)))
  usgrnloopv(c0, c2, cfv(cvtx, c0), c1, cv(s0), c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s0)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgrnloopALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph →(∃(s0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 })→ c2 ≠ c3))
  ⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  rexlimdva(s0, dom(c1), c0 ∈ USGraph, (c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 }, c2 ≠ c3)
  ex((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ s0 ∈ dom(c1)), (c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 }, c2 ≠ c3)
  mpcom(((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ s0 ∈ dom(c1))∧(c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 }), c2 ≠ c3, (c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0)∧ c3 ∈(Vtx ` c0)))
  imp((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ s0 ∈ dom(c1)), (c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 }, (c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0)∧ c3 ∈(Vtx ` c0)))
  usgredgprv(c0, s0, c1, c2, c3, (Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))
  adantr(c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0), c3 ∈(Vtx ` c0), (((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ s0 ∈ dom(c1))∧(c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 })→ c2 ≠ c3))
  com12(c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0), ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ s0 ∈ dom(c1))∧(c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 }), c2 ≠ c3)
  imp((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ s0 ∈ dom(c1)), (c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 }, (c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0)→ c2 ≠ c3))
  adantr(c0 ∈ USGraph, s0 ∈ dom(c1), ((c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 } →(c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0)→ c2 ≠ c3)))
  com23(c0 ∈ USGraph, (c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 }, c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0), c2 ≠ c3)
  ex(c0 ∈ USGraph, c2 ∈(Vtx ` c0), ((c1 ` s0)= { c2, c3 } → c2 ≠ c3))
  usgrnloopv(c0, c2, (Vtx ` c0), c1, s0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s0)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: usgrnloop0
blocks.content: A simple graph has no loops. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 17-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Dec-2020.)

blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ usgrnloop0 , not using ~ umgrnloop0 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 17-Oct-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrnloop0ALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), emptycls), wral(s0, cdm(c1), wn(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wral(s0, cdm(c1), wn(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))), wn(wrex(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))))
  mtod(wcel(c0, cusgr), wrex(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), wrex(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c2))))
  mtoi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wrex(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c2))), wne(c2, c2))
  neirr(c2)
  usgrnloop(s0, c0, c1, c2, c2)
  reximdv(s0, cdm(c1), wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c2)))
  ex(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c2)))
  syl6eq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, c2), csn(c2), wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))
  dfsn2(c2)
  ralnex(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))
  rabeq0(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgrnloop0ALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph → { s0 ∈ dom(c1)|(c1 ` s0)= { c2 } } = ∅)
  ⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylibr(c0 ∈ USGraph, { s0 ∈ dom(c1)|(c1 ` s0)= { c2 } } = ∅, ∀(s0 ∈ dom(c1), ¬(c1 ` s0)= { c2 }))
  sylibr(c0 ∈ USGraph, ∀(s0 ∈ dom(c1), ¬(c1 ` s0)= { c2 }), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` s0)= { c2 }))
  mtod(c0 ∈ USGraph, ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` s0)= { c2 }), ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` s0)= { c2, c2 }))
  mtoi(c0 ∈ USGraph, ∃(s0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` s0)= { c2, c2 }), c2 ≠ c2)
  neirr(c2)
  usgrnloop(s0, c0, c1, c2, c2)
  reximdv(s0, dom(c1), c0 ∈ USGraph, (c1 ` s0)= { c2 }, (c1 ` s0)= { c2, c2 })
  ex(c0 ∈ USGraph, (c1 ` s0)= { c2 }, (c1 ` s0)= { c2, c2 })
  syl6eq((c1 ` s0), { c2, c2 }, { c2 }, (c0 ∈ USGraph ∧(c1 ` s0)= { c2 }))
  simpr(c0 ∈ USGraph, (c1 ` s0)= { c2 })
  dfsn2(c2)
  ralnex(s0, dom(c1), (c1 ` s0)= { c2 })
  rabeq0(s0, dom(c1), (c1 ` s0)= { c2 })
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: usgredgne
blocks.content: An edge of a simple graph always connects two different vertices. Analogue of ~ usgrnloopv resp. ~ usgrnloop . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Sep-2017.) (Revised by AV, 17-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: usgrf1oedg
blocks.content: The edge function of a simple graph is a 1-1 function onto the set of edges. (Contributed by by AV, 18-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgrf1oedg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wf1o(c1, cdm(c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cusgr), wf1o(c1, cdm(c1), c2), wf1o(c1, cdm(c1), crn(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wf1o(c1, cdm(c1), crn(c1)), wf1(c1, cdm(c1), crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat2))))
  usgrf(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  f1f1orn(c1, cdm(c1), crab(hs0, cdif(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat2)))
  f1oeq3d(c1, cdm(c1), c2, crn(c1), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  syl5eq(c2, crn(c1), cfv(cedg, c0), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  syl6eq(cfv(cedg, c0), crn(c1), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(cfv(cedg, c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0))))
  edgval(c0)
  rneqi(cfv(ciedg, c0), c1)
  eqcomi(cfv(ciedg, c0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cvtx, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm usgrf1oedg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph →(c1 : dom(c1)↔ c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ USGraph, (c1 : dom(c1)↔ c2), (c1 : dom(c1)↔ ran(c1)))
  syl(c0 ∈ USGraph, (c1 : dom(c1)↔ ran(c1)), (c1 : dom(c1)↣ { hs0 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)= 2 }))
  usgrf(hs0, c0, c1, (Vtx ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))
  f1f1orn(c1, dom(c1), { hs0 ∈(P((Vtx ` c0))\ { ∅ })|(# ` hs0)= 2 })
  f1oeq3d(c1, dom(c1), c2, ran(c1), c0 ∈ USGraph)
  syl5eq(c2, ran(c1), (Edg ` c0), c0 ∈ USGraph)
  syl6eq((Edg ` c0), ran(c1), ran((iEdg ` c0)), c0 ∈ USGraph)
  a1i(c0 ∈ USGraph, (Edg ` c0)= ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  edgval(c0)
  rneqi((iEdg ` c0), c1)
  eqcomi((iEdg ` c0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Vtx ` c0))
}

blocks.name: uhgr2edg
blocks.content: If a vertex is adjacent to two different vertices in a hypergraph, there are more than one edges starting at this vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 11-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm uhgr2edg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wne(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c1), c5), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c5))), wrex(s0, cdm(c6), wrex(s1, cdm(c6), w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wne(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c1), c5), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c5))), wrex(s0, cdm(c6), wrex(s1, cdm(c6), w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s1))))))), wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  sylc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wne(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c1), c5), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c5))), wrex(s0, cdm(c6), wrex(s1, cdm(c6), w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s1)))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wne(c1, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c1, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)))), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c1), c5), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c5)))
  jca31(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wne(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c1), c5), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c5))), wcel(c0, cuhgr), wne(c1, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c1, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))))
  simp1l(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wne(c1, c2), w3a(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wa(wcel(cpr(c4, c1), c5), wcel(cpr(c2, c4), c5)))

blocks.name: umgr2edg
blocks.content: If a vertex is adjacent to two different vertices in a multigraph, there are more than one edges starting at this vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 11-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cedg, c0))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

} = {

blocks.name: usgr2edg
blocks.content: If a vertex is adjacent to two different vertices in a simple graph, there are more than one edges starting at this vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 17-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Feb-2021.)

thm usgr2edg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wne(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cpr(c3, c1), c4), wcel(cpr(c2, c3), c4))), wrex(s0, cdm(c5), wrex(s1, cdm(c5), w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cfv(c5, cv(s0))), wcel(c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  sylanl1(wcel(c0, cusgr), wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cpr(c3, c1), c4), wcel(cpr(c2, c3), c4)), wrex(s0, cdm(c5), wrex(s1, cdm(c5), w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cfv(c5, cv(s0))), wcel(c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, cumgr))
  usgrumgr(c0)
  umgr2edg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: usgrsizedg

blocks.origin:

blocks.name: uspgredg2v
blocks.content: In a simple pseudograph, the mapping of edges having a fixed endpoint to the "other" vertex of the edge (which may be the fixed vertex itself in the case of a loop) is a one-to-one function into the set of vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 6-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: usgriedgleord
blocks.content: Alternate version of ~ usgredgleord , not using the notation ` ( Edg `` G ) ` . In a simple graph the number of edges which contain a given vertex is not greater than the number of vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 18-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm usgriedgleord(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), cle, cfv(chash, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(cfv(chash, crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), cle, cfv(chash, c2)), wbr(crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), cdom, c2))
  mpsyl(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), cdom, c2), wcel(c2, universe), wf1(cmpt(hs0, crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), crio(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cpr(cv(hs1), c1)))), crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), c2))
  fvexi(c2, cvtx, c0)

  eqid(crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, crab(s0, cdm(c3), wcel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), crio(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cpr(cv(hs1), c1)))))

blocks.name: ushgredgedg
blocks.content: In a simple hypergraph there is a 1-1 onto mapping between the indexed edges containing a fixed vertex and the set of edges containing this vertex. (Contributed by AV, 11-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cushgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wf1o(c3, c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cedg, c0))

  syl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cushgr), wcel(c0, cuspgr))

thm usgredgedg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 : c4 ↔ c5))
  ⊣ c6 =(Edg ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 = { s0 ∈ dom(c7)| c1 ∈(c7 ` s0)}
  ⊣ c5 = { s1 ∈ c6 | c1 ∈ s1 }
  ⊣ c3 =(s2 ∈ c4 ↦(c7 ` s2))

  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)

  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ∈ USGraph, c1 ∈ c2, (c3 : c4 ↔ c5), c0 ∈ USHGraph)
  syl(c0 ∈ USGraph, c0 ∈ USHGraph, c0 ∈ USPGraph)
  usgruspgr(c0)
  uspgrushgr(c0)
  ushgredgedg(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)
}

  f1domg(c2, universe, cmpt(hs0, crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), crio(hs1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, cv(hs1))))), crab(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cv(s0))))

blocks.name: usgrstrrepe
blocks.content: Replacing (or adding) the edges (between elements of the base set) of an extensible structure results in a simple graph. Instead of requiring ` ( ph -> G Struct X ) ` , it would be sufficient to require ` ( ph -> Fun ( G \ { (/) } ) ) ` and ` ( ph -> G e. _V ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 13-Nov-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 16-Nov-2021.)

thm usgrstrrepe(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)∈ USGraph)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(.ef ` ndx)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Struct]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(Base ` ndx)∈ dom(c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈ P(c3)|(# ` s0)= 2 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)∈ USGraph), d(s0, w0))
  mpbird(w0, (c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)∈ USGraph, ((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)): dom((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))↣ { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }))
  mpbird(w0, ((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)): dom((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))↣ { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }), (c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }))
  mpbird(w0, (c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }), (c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈ P(c3)|(# ` s0)= 2 }))
  syl(w0, ((c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 })↔(c2 : dom(c2)↣ { s0 ∈ P(c3)|(# ` s0)= 2 })), { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 } = { s0 ∈ P(c3)|(# ` s0)= 2 })
  rabeqdv(s0, P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >))), P(c3), w0, (# ` s0)= 2)
  pweqd((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)), c3, w0)
  syl6eqr((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)), c3, (Base ` c0), w0)
  setsvtx(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  f1eq3({ s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }, { s0 ∈ P(c3)|(# ` s0)= 2 }, c2, dom(c2))
  f1eq123d((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)), dom((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >))), { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }, c2, dom(c2), { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }, w0)
  dmeqd((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)), c2, w0)
  setsiedg(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  eqidd({ s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 }, w0)
  mp1i(w0, ((c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)∈ USGraph ↔((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)): dom((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))↣ { s0 ∈ P((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))|(# ` s0)= 2 })), (c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)∈ 𝕌)
  ovex(c0, csts, < c1, c2 >)
  isusgrs(s0, (c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >), universe, (iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)), (Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))
  eqid((Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))
  eqid((iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c3)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, (c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >))
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, csts, < c1, c2 >)
  diff.csts.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
